creditline: Gift of the Print and Drawing Curatorial Council
description: ten lithographs bound together; vignettes from the life of a man; title page includes titles of plates; each plate numbered in LRC and titled in pencil; cover embossed with Asian-style design of birds

markings: on title page, stamped: artist\'s monogram
title: Les Grands Spectacles de la Nature--La Vie de Monsieur Quelconque
